data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rightmyer, Molly G., Griswold, Terry, Arduser, Michael S. (2010): A review of the non-metallic Osmia (Melanosmia) found in North America, with additional notes on palearctic Melanosmia (Hymenoptera, Megachilidae). ZooKeys 60: 37-77, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.60.484, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.60.484
